comments:
If no WSDL is selected in the navigator, start the web services wizard, select top down scenario, and click finish and unexpected CastCastException is thrown.
The client wizard works fine in the situation since it popups up an error dialog that indicated that WSDL was not specified.  The skeleton scenario needs to have a similar behaviour.

IWAB0014E Unexpected exception occured.
  
      java.lang.ClassCastException

It looks nasty, but I wouldn't characterize this as "major loss of function". Let me know if you disagree.
*** Bug 128677 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
This problem is no longer there for WTP 1.5 M6.
